commands.name: az storage account local-user create
commands.summary: Create a local user for a given storage account.
commands.syntax:
az storage account local-user create --account-name
                                     --name
                                     --resource-group
                                     [--has-shared-key {false, true}]
                                     [--has-ssh-key {false, true}]
                                     [--has-ssh-password {false, true}]
                                     [--home-directory]
                                     [--permission-scope]
                                     [--ssh-authorized-key]
examples: az storage account local-user create --account-name {account-name} -g {resource-group} -n {username} --home-directory home --permission-scope permissions=r service=blob resource-name=container1 --permission-scope permissions=rw service=file resource-name=share2 --ssh-authorized-key key="ssh-rsa a2V5" --has-ssh-key true --has-ssh-password --has-shared-key false

commands.name: az storage account local-user create
commands.summary: Create a local user for a given storage account.
commands.syntax:
az storage account local-user create --account-name
                                     --name
                                     --resource-group
                                     [--allow-acl-auth {false, true}]
                                     [--extended-groups]
                                     [--group-id]
                                     [--has-shared-key {false, true}]
                                     [--has-ssh-key {false, true}]
                                     [--has-ssh-password {false, true}]
                                     [--home-directory]
                                     [--is-nfsv3-enabled {false, true}]
                                     [--permission-scope]
                                     [--ssh-authorized-key]
examples: az storage account local-user create --account-name {account-name} -g {resource-group} -n {username} --home-directory home --permission-scope permissions=r service=blob resource-name=container1 --permission-scope permissions=rw service=file resource-name=share2 --ssh-authorized-key key="ssh-rsa a2V5" --has-ssh-key true --has-ssh-password --has-shared-key false --group-id 1 --allow-acl-authorization true --extended-groups 3 4 --is-nfsv3-enabled true

commands.name: az storage account local-user list
commands.summary: List local users for a storage account.

commands.name: az storage account local-user list
commands.summary: List local users for a storage account.
examples: az storage account local-user list --account-name {account-name} -g {resource-group} --filter "startswith(name, test)" --maxpagesize 3

commands.name: az storage account local-user list-keys
commands.summary: List sharedkeys and sshAuthorizedKeys for a local user.

commands.name: az storage account local-user list-keys
commands.summary: List sharedkeys and sshAuthorizedKeys for a local user.

commands.name: az storage account local-user regenerate-password
commands.summary: Regenerate sshPassword for a local user.

commands.name: az storage account local-user regenerate-password
commands.summary: Regenerate sshPassword for a local user.

commands.name: az storage account local-user show
commands.summary: Show info for a local user.

commands.name: az storage account local-user show
commands.summary: Show info for a local user.

commands.name: az storage account local-user update
commands.summary: Update properties for a local user.
commands.syntax:
az storage account local-user update --account-name
                                     --name
                                     --resource-group
                                     [--has-shared-key {false, true}]
                                     [--has-ssh-key {false, true}]
                                     [--has-ssh-password {false, true}]
                                     [--home-directory]
                                     [--permission-scope]
                                     [--ssh-authorized-key]
examples: az storage account local-user update --account-name {account-name} -g {resource-group} -n {username} --permission-scope permissions=rw service=file resource-name=share2 --has-ssh-key false

commands.name: az storage account local-user update
commands.summary: Update properties for a local user.
commands.syntax:
az storage account local-user update --account-name
                                     --name
                                     --resource-group
                                     [--allow-acl-auth {false, true}]
                                     [--extended-groups]
                                     [--group-id]
                                     [--has-shared-key {false, true}]
                                     [--has-ssh-key {false, true}]
                                     [--has-ssh-password {false, true}]
                                     [--home-directory]
                                     [--permission-scope]
                                     [--ssh-authorized-key]
examples: az storage account local-user update --account-name {account-name} -g {resource-group} -n {username} --permission-scope permissions=rw service=file resource-name=share2 --has-ssh-key false --group-id 2 --allow-acl-authorization false --extended-groups 3 4
